comment.language: Melodies for the Distribution may be chanted.

After the priest finishes this prayer and the washing of the sacred vessels, water is poured into the palms of his hands, of which he sprinkles a small amount onto the table, and he says the following.
Setelah Imam selesai mengucapkan doa ini dan mencuci peralatan suci, air dituangkan ke telapak tangannya, lalu sedikit dipercikkannya atas altar dan diucapkannya kalimat berikut.
وبعد نهاية هذه الصلاة وغسل الآنية يُصَبُّ ماءٌ للكاهن في يديه، فيَرُشُّ منه قليلاً على المائدة ويقول هذا الربع:

text.language: Paggeloc n~te taiyucia: eth/l e~p~[ici nem paihumnoc: a~ripenmeui~ qat~h/ m~P[oic: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
O angel of this sacrifice, flying up to the highest with this hymn, remember us before the Lord, that He may forgive us our sins.

language.div: Ya malaikat dari kurban ini, terbanglah ke tempat tertinggi dengan himne ini, ingatlah kami di hadapan Tuhan, kiranya Dia mengampuni dosa-dosa kami.

text.language: يا ملاكَ هذه الصعيدةِ الطائر إلى العلو بهذه التسبحةِ، أذكرنا قدام الربِّ ليغفرَ لنا خطايانا.

comment.language: The priest wipes his face with his hands, and he turns to his brethren the priests, above and below, making them partners with him by the touch of his hands, and whomsoever he has made partner with him, he wipes his face with his hands and they do likewise. Then he places his hand upon the heads of the people and blesses them. (This is now done through sprinking them with the holy water instead of laying the hand on each one).

language.div: Imam mencipratkan air ke atas kepada malaikat kurban hari ini, kemudian dia meletakkan tangannya di dua sisi kursi chalice, kemudian di atas wajahnya untuk berkat, dan dia melakukan hal yang sama dengan saudara-saudaranya para imam dan kemudian di atas kepala para diaken. Kemudian dia mencipratkan air kepada jemaat dan selama itu dia mengucapkan berkat.

comment.language: ثم يمسح وجهه بيديه ويلتفت إلى أخوته الكهنة فوق وأسفل ويشاركهم بيديه. وكل من شاركه يمسح هو بيديه على وجهه. وهم أيضاً يعملون كذلك. ثم يضع يده على رؤوس الشعب ويباركهم (ولكن هذا يكون حالياً عن طريق رشِّهم بماء مقدس بدلاً من وضع اليد على كلِّ واحد) ثم يعطيهم التسريح.
He then dismisses them and concludes with the blessing.
Kemudian, dia membubarkan mereka dan mengakhiri dengan berkat.
